entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as one of the characters staring at Professor Lockhart. He is described as sounding slightly guilty when speaking to Professor Lockhart.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the characters who exclaims 'Oh my goodness' upon seeing Professor Lockhart. She sounds breathless.

entities.name: professor lockhart
entities.description: Professor Lockhart is introduced as their ex-Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who has landed in a closed ward due to Ron's malfunctioning wand damaging his memory.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as one of the characters staring at Professor Lockhart. He mutters to Ginny that Professor Lockhart hasn't changed much.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as one of the characters who grins in response to Harry's comment about Professor Lockhart.

relationships.description: Ron's malfunctioning wand damaged Professor Lockhart's memory, leading to his current situation.
Harry and Ron shared the experience of having their memories attempted to be wiped by Professor Lockhart.
